SEARCH

Uses of Package
OOPProject

  • Classes in OOPProject used by OOPProject
    Class
    Description
    AdministratorService
    Service class for managing hospital staff and medication inventory.
    AdminStaffManagement
    Interface for managing the administration of hospital staff, including administrators, doctors, and pharmacists.
    Appointment
    The Appointment class represents a scheduled appointment for a patient with a specific doctor at a certain time slot.
    AppointmentOutcome
    Represents the outcome of an appointment, including consultation notes, medical record information, and prescription status.
    AppointmentService
    This interface defines the operations available for managing appointments, appointment slots, and appointment outcomes within the system.
    AppointmentSlot
    Represents an appointment slot for a doctor in the system.
    AppointmentStatus
    Enum representing the various statuses an appointment can have.
    BloodType
    Enum representing the different blood types.
    Diagnosis
    Represents a medical diagnosis in the system.
    Doctor
    The Doctor class represents a doctor user in the system, extending the User class.
    DoctorService
    DoctorService handles the medical record management, appointment scheduling, and various doctor-related functionalities like viewing and updating patient records.
    Gender
    Enum representing the gender of an individual.
    loadCSVClass
    This class is responsible for loading data from CSV files into the corresponding lists.
    MedicalRecord
    Represents a medical record in the hospital system.
    MedicalRecordService
    The MedicalRecordService interface defines the contract for managing medical records within the hospital system.
    Medication
    The Medication class represents a medication item in the inventory system.
    Patient
    The Patient class represents a patient in the hospital system.
    PatientService
    The PatientService class provides functionality for patients to manage their appointments, personal information, and view medical records.
    Pharmacist
    Represents a pharmacist in the hospital system.
    PharmacistService
    Provides services for pharmacists, including managing appointment outcomes, prescriptions, and medication inventory.
    Prescription
    Represents a prescription containing details about the medication, dosage, frequency, and duration.
    PrescriptionStatus
    Represents the status of a prescription in the system.
    Role
    Represents the roles available in the hospital management system.
    Treatment
    Represents a medical treatment prescribed by a doctor for a patient.
    User
    Represents a user in the hospital management system.
